title: Bike benefit service
body: Lead developer in a work benefit bicycle system project. The goal is to build a new system with modern technologies. Responsibilities include frontend development, backend development, building a database schema, CI/CD, testing and project management.

title: Säästösaukko
body: I tracked my spendings using a Google sheet. Very soon I grew tired of inputting timestamps in the sheet and decided to build a mobile application for it. The app allows the user to track spendings, view statistics and set recurring costs. The backend is built with Express and MongoDB. The frontend is built with React Native.

title: Electricity app
body: Implementation of an electricity mobile application. Allows users to track consumption, view graphs, compare data, view electricity market price etc. Worked on both client and server side.

title: Map application
body: A React app embedded in a Drupal site. The application displays a world map and allows users to filter and view data of countries.

title: Another map application
body: An application that allows the user to place objects and buildings on the map and then generate a heatmap.

title: Plumber
body: Trained a neural network on images of my friends. The model ended up generating monstrous almost human like pictures which I used in a Tinder-like React app. Only clientside.

title: Data processing system
body: Implementation and maintenance of a system that processes large amounts of data every night. Worked on both client and server side.

title: Housing company
body: Implementation and maintenance of a module that fetches data and creates website content out of it. Implementation of a REST API that serves that content to a React application.

title: Deep spiritual quote generator
body: Scraped deep quotes of life and love from the internet. Trained a language model that generates text from that material. Built a Flask API to serve that and a React app to fetch and display the data.
